email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 5,000 MT of steel coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles under CIF terms. Could you provide a rate estimate and vessel availability for this shipment? We are targeting a laycan of April 15-20.

Best regards,
Laura Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 65,000 and LOA of 225m, for your shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT. The laycan of April 15-20 is feasible, and we can confirm the loading window once the booking is secured.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 45.50 per MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering it to USD 43.00 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains April 15-20, and the loading window is 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Laura Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Shanghai on April 15, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
